data.title: Buenos Aires: The Capital of the World Champions of Football and Inflation!
data.meta_description: The first stop of my recent journey through Latin America was wonderful Buenos Aires, the capital of Argentina, a country famous for two things: Football and Inflation! As such, when you come to…
data.text:
Impressions of Argentina’s magnificent and diverse capital

The first stop of my recent journey through Latin America was wonderful Buenos Aires, the capital of Argentina, a country famous for two things: Football and Inflation!

As such, when you come to Buenos Aires, prepare for massive price fluctuations, random people on every street corner offering you the chance to exchange your dollars, euros or pounds for pesos, and long queues stretching out of every Western Union office in the city!
